message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its quality and features, I'm offering it at $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm really interested in the product, but $22,000 is out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get a better deal.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While I'm motivated to find a fair deal, $12,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? This reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your interest.

I appreciate your understanding of the product's value, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its features and quality.
